Uses of Package
com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

  • Packages that use com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui 
    Package Description
    com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui  
    com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.item  
    com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.screen  
  • Classes in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui used by com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAlignableGuiNode
    This GUI node can align itself based on an AbstractAlignableGuiNode.Alignment that is set using AbstractAlignableGuiNode.setAlignment(Alignment) it will use the parent node as reference.
    AbstractAlignableGuiNode.Alignment
    This enum represents alignments that the AbstractAlignableGuiNode can use to position itself within a parent node.
    AbstractNode
    This class represents the base of a GUI node, all GUI components are derived from this class.
    GuiButton
    This GUI node is a button it will trigger all listeners when a mouse button is pressed.
    GuiContainer
    This GUI node represents a basic container allowing for a background and outline color.
    GuiImage
    This GUI node allows for an image within a container.
    GuiItemContainer
    This GUI node represents an item container that displays all the contained items in a grid of item slots.
    GuiItemSlot
    This GUI node represents a item slot, it can contain a stack of items defined by the interface AbstractItemStack.
    GuiLabel
    This GUI node represents a container containing text with the ability to auto adjust the container size depending on the size of the text.
    GuiList
    This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar.
    GuiProgressBar
    This GUI node is a progress bar that allows for both vertical and horizontal display and allows a value between zero and a given max value.
    GuiSelectionList
    This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar and will retain a selected item upon clicking it.
    GuiSlider
    This GUI node represents a slider knob.
    GuiText
    This GUI node represents a label containing text.
  • Classes in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui used by com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.item 
    Class and Description
    GuiItemSlot
    This GUI node represents a item slot, it can contain a stack of items defined by the interface AbstractItemStack.
  • Classes in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui used by com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.screen 
    Class and Description
    GuiContainer
    This GUI node represents a basic container allowing for a background and outline color.
